details:
Getting to know about On-Campus Placement process by the 2022 batch who have bagged wonderful opportunities at big MNCs in both technical and non-technical domain

- Each speaker talked about their interview like what questions were asked to them, how did they answer the questions in a sequential manner.

- Speakers also talked about how they prepared for the interviews, what all they referred to prepare for the interviews.
name: Placement Talk

details:
An interactive session conducted about resume building.
Speaker: Mr. Pranav Singh.  (Senior Product manager at Walmart and Ex Barclays Vice President)

Topics covered-
How to build a resume.
How to build a resume from scratch.
Speaker shared his resume and discussed what things you can put.
Pointed out how a correct resume should be.
Speakerâ€™s experience about product management and his experience at Walmart.
Q&A session
name: Resume Building Workshop

details:
An interactive session was conducted about guesstimates and how to solve them. 

Speakers:
Harsh Agrawal (ETRX 2022-WorkIndia)
Kushagra Gautam(ETRX 2022 - ZS Associates)
Arnav Chaudhari (ETRX 2022 - GEP)

Topics Covered-
What are Guesstimates and the different approaches one can use to solve the guesstimates.
Speakers discussed the guesstimates that were asked to them in their interviews.
Four examples of guesstimates.
Q&A session
name: Guesstimates Solving Workshop

details: An interactive session was conducted about basic financial knowledge. The students got to know everything about the basics of finance from our speaker.
name: Basic of Finances
